title: Who played the guitar solo in the Eagles' Hotel California and is he still active? - Quora

response.answer_text: Joe Walsh and Don Felder did all the harmony parts, during the verses, not just Don Felder. Also during the solo Don Felder plays the first section. When Don Felder finishes Joe Walsh comes in. You can tell when Joe Walsh comes in because he lays into a blistering Chuck Berry type lick which he ends with one of his signature quick slides from one note to the next to another position. After Joe Walsh finishes his solo, he and Don Felder trade licks for a bit, and then go into the final outro harmony arpeggios. I posted a couple of links to two guys who were present for the recording of Hotel California, who give a pretty good account of who played what… Here’s a clip of Joe Walsh talking about the guitar parts in Hotel California.  Here's Don Felder in his own words in an interview discussing the guitar work in Hotel California. Don Felder: “Then I went back and did most of the guitars, except for the stuff where Joe and I set up on two stools and ran the harmony parts down. I play the first solo, then it’s Joe. Then we trade lines and go into the lead harmonies. 100 Greatest Guitar Solos: No. 8 — The Eagles' "Hotel California" (Don Felder, Joe Walsh) And there you have the answer to who played the solos on Hotel California, straight from the guys who played the solos, Don Felder and Joe Walsh. And yes, Joe Walsh and Don Felder are still both active making music.

There are two guitarists playing the solos at the end of Hotel California: Don Felder (who also wrote the song music) and Joe Walsh. Felder played the first solo, Walsh the second and afterwards both trade licks and harmonise till the end of the song. You can see quite clearly what does each play in this video taken from the Hotel California tour. They play the song very much as in the record, including the solos. Don Felder is the guy playing a twin neck guitar and Joe Walsh, the guy wearing a bandanna:  Both are still active. Joe Walsh has been a part of the Eagles ever since 1975 and he still plays with the band occasionally, while also playing solo and with lots of other artists. Don Felder, on the contrary, was fired from the Eagles back in 2001 and is reported to not having even spoken again with Don Henley or Glen Frey. He has been playing with his own band since.
